00042 void TableMutator::handle_exceptions() {
00043   try {
00044     throw;
00045   }
00046   catch (Exception &e) {
00047     m_last_error = e.code();
00048 
00049     if (m_last_error == Error::RANGESERVER_GENERATION_MISMATCH) {
00050       HT_WARN_OUT << e << HT_END;
00051       m_table->refresh(m_table_identifier, m_schema);
00052     }
00053     else
00054       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00055   }
00056   catch (std::bad_alloc &e) {
00057     m_last_error = Error::BAD_MEMORY_ALLOCATION;
00058     HT_ERROR("caught bad_alloc here");
00059   }
00060   catch (std::exception &e) {
00061     m_last_error = Error::EXTERNAL;
00062     HT_ERRORF("caught std::exception: %s", e.what());
00063   }
00064   catch (...) {
00065     m_last_error = Error::EXTERNAL;
00066     HT_ERROR("caught unknown exception here");
00067   }
00068 }

00071 TableMutator::TableMutator(PropertiesPtr & props, Comm *comm, Table *table,
00072     RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator, uint32_t timeout_ms, uint32_t flags)
00073   : m_comm(comm), m_table(table), m_range_locator(range_locator),
00074     m_memory_used(0), m_resends(0), m_timeout_ms(timeout_ms), m_flags(flags),
00075     m_prev_buffer_flags(0), m_flush_delay(0), m_last_error(Error::OK),
00076     m_last_op(0) {
00077 
00078   HT_ASSERT(timeout_ms);
00079 
00080   table->get(m_table_identifier, m_schema);
00081 
00082   m_flush_delay = props->get_i32("Hypertable.Mutator.FlushDelay");
00083   m_max_memory = props->get_i64("Hypertable.Mutator.ScatterBuffer.FlushLimit.Aggregate");
00084   m_buffer = new TableMutatorScatterBuffer(m_comm, &m_table_identifier,
00085       m_schema, m_range_locator, timeout_ms);
00086 }
00087 
00088 TableMutator::~TableMutator() {
00089   // Flush buffers and sync rangeserver commit logs
00090   HT_TRY_OR_LOG("final flush", flush());
00091 }

00093 void
00094 TableMutator::set(const KeySpec &key, const void *value, uint32_t value_len) {
00095   Timer timer(m_timeout_ms);
00096 
00097   try {
00098     m_last_op = SET;
00099     auto_flush(timer);
00100     key.sanity_check();
00101 
00102     Key full_key;
00103     to_full_key(key, full_key);
00104     m_buffer->set(full_key, value, value_len, timer);
00105     m_memory_used += 20 + key.row_len + key.column_qualifier_len + value_len;
00106   }
00107   catch (...) {
00108     handle_exceptions();
00109     save_last(key, value, value_len);
00110     throw;
00111   }
00112 }

00115 void
00116 TableMutator::set_cells(Cells::const_iterator it, Cells::const_iterator end) {
00117   Timer timer(m_timeout_ms);
00118 
00119   try {
00120     m_last_op = SET_CELLS;
00121     auto_flush(timer);
00122 
00123     for (; it != end; ++it) {
00124       Key full_key;
00125       const Cell &cell = *it;
00126       cell.sanity_check();
00127 
00128       if (!cell.column_family) {
00129         full_key.row = cell.row_key;
00130         full_key.timestamp = cell.timestamp;
00131         full_key.revision = cell.revision;
00132         full_key.flag = cell.flag;
00133       }
00134       else
00135         to_full_key(cell, full_key);
00136 
00137       // assuming all inserts for now
00138       m_buffer->set(full_key, cell.value, cell.value_len, timer);
00139       m_memory_used += 20 + strlen(cell.row_key)
00140           + (cell.column_qualifier ? strlen(cell.column_qualifier) : 0);
00141     }
00142   }
00143   catch (...) {
00144     handle_exceptions();
00145     save_last(it, end);
00146     throw;
00147   }
00148 }

00151 void TableMutator::set_delete(const KeySpec &key) {
00152   Timer timer(m_timeout_ms);
00153   Key full_key;
00154 
00155   try {
00156     m_last_op = SET_DELETE;
00157     auto_flush(timer);
00158     key.sanity_check();
00159 
00160     if (!key.column_family) {
00161       full_key.row = (const char *)key.row;
00162       full_key.timestamp = key.timestamp;
00163       full_key.revision = key.revision;
00164     }
00165     else
00166       to_full_key(key, full_key);
00167 
00168     m_buffer->set_delete(full_key, timer);
00169     m_memory_used += 20 + key.row_len + key.column_qualifier_len;
00170   }
00171   catch (...) {
00172     handle_exceptions();
00173     m_last_key = key;
00174     throw;
00175   }
00176 }

00179 void
00180 TableMutator::to_full_key(const void *row, const char *column_family,
00181     const void *column_qualifier, int64_t timestamp, int64_t revision,
00182     uint8_t flag, Key &full_key) {
00183   if (!column_family)
00184     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "Column family not specified");
00185 
00186   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf = m_schema->get_column_family(column_family);
00187 
00188   if (!cf)
00189     HT_THROWF(Error::BAD_KEY, "Bad column family '%s'", column_family);
00190 
00191   full_key.row = (const char *)row;
00192   full_key.column_qualifier = (const char *)column_qualifier;
00193   full_key.column_family_code = (uint8_t)cf->id;
00194   full_key.timestamp = timestamp;
00195   full_key.revision = revision;
00196   full_key.flag = flag;
00197 }

00200 void TableMutator::auto_flush(Timer &timer) {
00201   if (m_buffer->full() || m_memory_used > m_max_memory) {
00202     try {
00203       m_last_op = FLUSH;
00204       timer.start();
00205 
00206       if (m_prev_buffer)
00207         wait_for_previous_buffer(timer);
00208 
00209       if (m_flush_delay)
00210         poll(0, 0, m_flush_delay);
00211 
00212       m_buffer->send(m_rangeserver_flags_map, m_flags);
00213       m_prev_buffer = m_buffer;
00214       m_prev_buffer_flags = m_flags;
00215       m_buffer = new TableMutatorScatterBuffer(m_comm, &m_table_identifier,
00216           m_schema, m_range_locator, m_timeout_ms);
00217       m_memory_used = 0;
00218     }
00219     HT_RETHROW("auto flushing")
00220   }
00221 }
00222 
00223 
00224 void TableMutator::flush() {
00225   Timer timer(m_timeout_ms, true);
00226 
00227   try {
00228     if (m_prev_buffer)
00229       wait_for_previous_buffer(timer);
00230 
00235     if (m_memory_used > 0) {
00236       // flush & sync non-empty buffers
00237       m_buffer->send(m_rangeserver_flags_map, 0);
00238       // sync remaining unsynced rangeservers
00239       sync();
00240       m_prev_buffer = m_buffer;
00241       m_prev_buffer_flags = 0;
00242       wait_for_previous_buffer(timer);
00243       m_rangeserver_flags_map.clear();
00244     }
00245 
00246     m_buffer->reset();
00247     m_prev_buffer = 0;
00248 
00249   }
00250   catch (...) {
00251     handle_exceptions();
00252     m_last_op = FLUSH;
00253     throw;
00254   }
00255 }

00258 bool TableMutator::retry(uint32_t timeout_ms) {
00259   uint32_t save_timeout = m_timeout_ms;
00260 
00261   if (m_last_error == Error::OK)
00262     return true;
00263 
00264   m_last_error = Error::OK;
00265 
00266   try {
00267     if (timeout_ms != 0)
00268       m_timeout_ms = timeout_ms;
00269 
00270     switch (m_last_op) {
00271     case SET:        set(m_last_key, m_last_value, m_last_value_len);   break;
00272     case SET_DELETE: set_delete(m_last_key);                            break;
00273     case SET_CELLS:  set_cells(m_last_cells_it, m_last_cells_end);      break;
00274     case FLUSH:      flush();                                           break;
00275     }
00276   }
00277   catch(...) {
00278     m_timeout_ms = save_timeout;
00279     return false;
00280   }
00281   m_timeout_ms = save_timeout;
00282   return true;
00283 }
00284 
00285 void TableMutator::sync() {
00286   vector<String> unsynced_rangeservers;
00287 
00288   try {
00289     for (hash_map<String, uint32_t>::iterator iter = m_rangeserver_flags_map.begin();
00290          iter != m_rangeserver_flags_map.end(); ++iter) {
00291       if ((iter->second & FLAG_NO_LOG_SYNC) == FLAG_NO_LOG_SYNC)
00292         unsynced_rangeservers.push_back(iter->first);
00293     }
00294 
00295     if (!unsynced_rangeservers.empty()) {
00296       TableMutatorSyncDispatchHandler sync_handler(m_comm, 5000);
00297 
00298       for(vector<String>::iterator iter = unsynced_rangeservers.begin();
00299           iter != unsynced_rangeservers.end(); ++iter ) {
00300         sync_handler.add((*iter));
00301       }
00302 
00303       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_completion()) {
00304         std::vector<TableMutatorSyncDispatchHandler::ErrorResult> errors;
00305         uint32_t retry_count = 0;
00306         bool retry_failed;
00307         do {
00308           retry_count++;
00309           sync_handler.get_errors(errors);
00310           for (size_t i=0; i<errors.size(); i++) {
00311             HT_ERRORF("commit log sync error - %s - %s",
00312                 errors[i].msg.c_str(), Error::get_text(errors[i].error));
00313           }
00314           sync_handler.retry();
00315         }
00316         while ((retry_failed = (!sync_handler.wait_for_completion())) &&
00317             retry_count < ms_max_sync_retries);
00321         if (retry_failed) {
00322           sync_handler.get_errors(errors);
00323           String error_str;
00324           error_str =  (String) "commit log sync error '" + errors[0].msg.c_str() + "' '" +
00325                        Error::get_text(errors[0].error) + "' max retry limit=" +
00326                        ms_max_sync_retries + " hit";
00327           HT_THROW(errors[0].error, error_str);
00328         }
00329       }
00330     }
00331   }
00332   catch (...) {
00333     handle_exceptions();
00334     throw;
00335   }
00336 }
00337 
00338 void TableMutator::wait_for_previous_buffer(Timer &timer) {
00339   try {
00340     TableMutatorScatterBuffer *redo_buffer = 0;
00341     uint32_t wait_time = 1000;
00342 
00343     timer.start();
00344 
00345     while (!m_prev_buffer->wait_for_completion(timer)) {
00346 
00347       if (timer.remaining() < wait_time)
00348         HT_THROW_(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT);
00349 
00350       // wait a bit
00351       poll(0, 0, wait_time);
00352       wait_time += 2000;
00353 
00354       // redo buffer is needed to resend (ranges split/moves etc)
00355       if ((redo_buffer = m_prev_buffer->create_redo_buffer(timer)) == 0)
00356         continue;
00357 
00358       m_resends += m_prev_buffer->get_resend_count();
00359       m_prev_buffer = redo_buffer;
00360 
00361       // Re-send failed updates
00362       m_prev_buffer->send(m_rangeserver_flags_map, m_prev_buffer_flags);
00363     }
00364   }
00365   HT_RETHROW("waiting for previous buffer")
00366 }

00369 std::ostream &
00370 TableMutator::show_failed(const Exception &e, std::ostream &out) {
00371   FailedMutations failed_mutations;
00372 
00373   get_failed(failed_mutations);
00374 
00375   if (!failed_mutations.empty()) {
00376     foreach(const FailedMutation &v, failed_mutations) {
00377       out << "Failed: (" << v.first.row_key << "," << v.first.column_family;
00378 
00379       if (v.first.column_qualifier && *(v.first.column_qualifier))
00380         out << ":" << v.first.column_qualifier;
00381 
00382       out << "," << v.first.timestamp << ") - "
00383           << Error::get_text(v.second) << '\n';
00384     }
00385     out.flush();
00386   }
00387   else throw e;
00388 
00389   return out;
00390 }
